tool_description:
URL details, load-time, and title of target doc
Check for dead URLs
name: URL Expander
title: URL Expander

api_list.name: URL_Expander
api_list.description:
Provide short_url through Query Param.
If the target URL is no more active (or removed/moved) it will return 
{ target_url_alive : False }
URL's response_time is in milliseconds

optional_parameters.name: get_title
optional_parameters.description:
If get_title set to True, then the title of the document will be extracted from url.
Note: Don't set this flag true if the title is not needed, to avoid slow-down
